# altinity Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    altinity = {
      source  = "altinity/altinity"
      version = "0.0.1"
    }
  }
}

provider "altinity" {
  # Configuration options
}
```

### Optional

- `server_url` (String) Server URL (defaults to https://acm.altinity.cloud)
